== Prerequisites
The following assumes that you have already a basic understanding of how Android applications are created. See the http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/Android/article.html"> Android Tutorial for details. Also the following description assume that you know the basis of the Android build system based on Gradle. See http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/AndroidBuild/article.html"> Building Android applications with Gradle Tutorial for an introduction.
For more information about Gradle see the http://www.vogella.com/tutorials/Gradle/article.html"> Gradle Tutorial .
